mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.city_name,t.city_id,t.yj_name,t.yj_zz,i.imgname FROM q_yj_table t LEFT JOIN q_yj_img i ON i.tp_id=t.url LIMIT 0,12

select any_value(j.id) as id,any_value(y.city_name) as city_name, any_value(y.city_id) as city_id,any_value(y.yj_name) as yj_name, any_value(y.yj_zz) as yj_zz,any_value(y.cf_time) as cf_time, any_value(y.cf_time2) as cf_time2,any_value(y.xc_jg) as xc_jg, any_value(y.xc_day) as xc_day,any_value(y.xc_day2) as xc_day2, any_value(y.xc_rs) as xc_rs,any_value(y.xc_tj) as xc_tj, any_value(y.xc_ap) as xc_ap,any_value(y.xc_nr_html) as xc_nr_html, any_value(y.rm) as rm,any_value(y.url) as url, group_concat(j.imgname separator '|') as imgname from q_yj_table y left join q_yj_img j on y.url=j.tp_id
group by yj_name limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
